p: Prototype Zika Nica 2-16 strain used for challenge was originally isolated from a ZIKV-infected Nicaraguan patient in 2016 by the National Virology Laboratory, Ministry of Health, Managua, Nicaragua ( Tabata et al., 2016). The virus was propagated in C6/36 cells to generate the virus stock and titered by focus-forming assay on BHK cells ( Kostyuchenko et al., 2016).
